snippet: The private equity firm announced on Tuesday that it had agreed to buy a majority stake in Accuvant, which offers cybersecurity software and consulting services to companies and governments.
abstract: The private equity firm announced on Tuesday that it had agreed to buy a majority stake in Accuvant, which offers cybersecurity software and consulting services to companies and governments.

headline.main: Blackstone to Acquire Cybersecurity Firm Accuvant
